function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"Conducting a survey and collecting data from 170 individual respondents during a pandemic","Impact":"Increased risk of spreading contagious diseases through in-person data collection","Mitigation":"Use online survey tools and virtual data collection methods to minimize in-person interactions","Technologies":"Online survey tools, virtual meeting platforms","People":"Survey respondents, data collectors, researchers","Owner":"Researchers, survey organizers"},{"Description":"Gathering data on the quality of everyday life during the COVID-19 pandemic","Impact":"Possibility of exposing respondents and data collectors to the virus during data collection","Mitigation":"Adopt strict safety measures during data collection, provide personal protective equipment to data collectors and respondents","Technologies":"Personal protective equipment, virtual data collection methods","People":"Survey respondents, data collectors, researchers","Owner":"Researchers, survey organizers"},{"Description":"Evaluating the resilience of existing housing stock and examining the guidelines for its improvement during a pandemic","Impact":"Increased risk of exposure to contagious diseases for researchers and stakeholders involved in the evaluation and improvement process","Mitigation":"Implement strict safety protocols for site visits and inspections, use virtual tools for evaluation where possible","Technologies":"Virtual reality tools, remote inspection technologies, personal protective equipment","People":"Researchers, stakeholders, residents of housing stock","Owner":"Researchers, stakeholders"}]}
